mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, email, phone, role, status, create_time, update_time FROM user WHERE username = #{username} AND status = 1
SELECT id, username, password, email, phone, role, status, create_time, update_time FROM user WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, email, phone, role, status) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{role}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, role = #{role}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
